Mad Mimi

Mad Mimi is a simple, intelligent and powerful email marketing utility that anyone can use. It makes email marketing easy for the creator, and easier on the eyes for the receiver. With ground-breaking technology, Mad Mimi is the simplest way to create branded, well-designed newsletters and promotions.

http://madmimi.com/

What we did for Mad Mimi:

Flatterline worked with Mad Mimi to research, analyze and present possible solutions to database performance problems that were affecting their user experience.
